item.title: Wiretapping under the 46th Presidency
item.description: To rule is the exercise of control on the basis of knowledge Surveillance is one of the forces that enable social organization. The era of the information society is the age of over-penetrating bureaucracy, to such an extent that simply to participate in modern society is to be under electronic surveillance.
